name: Uberius's Tooth
loreDescription: Treasure of the Wintenberg royal family made from the remains of wicked dragon Uberius. It's said to be capable of ripping dragon scale armor.

skillDescription.base: 50.0% chance to inflict additional damage if a critical hit is made upon a Single Attack. Additional damage is proportional to the caster's Attack.
skillDescription.max: 100.0% chance to inflict additional damage if a critical hit is made upon a Single Attack. Additional damage is proportional to the caster's Attack.
